body.p: GCC 3.4 has finally been marked stable on x86. No one will have their compiler automatically switched to gcc-3.4 after it is installed, so you can handle the migration to using it as your system compiler when you have time. To assist you in the migration we have made a GCC migration guide.
For support issues, #gentoo is the place to receive help. Bugs found in the course of this upgrade should be filed under the "Gentoo Linux" product, and "GCC Porting" component on Gentoo's Bugzilla.
